Articles.Content:
I'm returning to KSP after some months. Last time I played was in November 2016 and I really enjoyed the auto-struting option that was added in 1.2. Now I'm playing 1.3 and can't find the struting option on any part anymore. Was the feature removed or I'm looking in the wrong place? Playing sandbox btw.

Nevermind, found my answer! "Advanced tweakables" was deactivated in settings.

Edited August 1, 2017 by Midnight Jade
